title: Push up
description: A movement where the body is kept straight, and you lower and raise yourself by bending and extending the arms. It targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

title: Sit up 1
description: Lying on your back, bending your knees and holding your arms behind your head, lift your body upwards. It aims to develop your abdominal muscles.

title: Sit up 2
description: Lying on your back, lift your knees and arms up, then return to the supine position and repeat. It aims to develop your abdominal muscles.

title: Squat
description: Standing with feet shoulder-width apart, you bend your knees and lower your body as if sitting down, then return to the starting position. It works the legs, glutes, and core.

title: Dumbbell 1
description: It helps to strengthen muscle groups and improve body shape with free weight training. The aim of this exercise is to strengthen arm muscles.

title: Dumbbell 2
description: By lifting the weights even higher, the aim is to strengthen the arm muscles and the back of the arm.

title: Leg 1
description: With your hands firmly on the floor, pull your legs back and forth alternately. This specifically targets the lower abs.

title: Leg 2
description: Lie on your back and lift your legs one at a time toward the ceiling. This specifically targets the lower abdominals.
